```{r}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(coda)
library(glue)
library(kableExtra)

samples <- read_csv("samples.csv") |>
    rename(Iteration = `...1`) |>
    pivot_longer(c("xscale", "xshift", "yscale", "yshift", "death_rate"),
        names_to = "Parameter",
        values_to = "Sample"
    )

truth <- tibble(
    Parameter = c("xscale", "xshift", "yscale", "yshift", "death_rate"),
    Truth = c(1, 5, 2, 0.5, 0.5)
)
```

## Traceplots

```{r}
#| fig-height: 6

left_join(samples, truth, by = "Parameter") |>
    filter(Iteration > 100) |>
    ggplot(aes(Iteration, Sample)) +
    geom_line() +
    geom_hline(aes(yintercept = Truth, color = "Truth")) +
    facet_wrap(vars(Parameter), ncol = 1, scales = "free")
```

\pagebreak

## Densities

```{r}
#| fig-height: 6

left_join(samples, truth, by = "Parameter") |>
    ggplot() +
    geom_histogram(
        aes(x = Sample, y = after_stat(density), fill = "Posterior")
    ) +
    geom_vline(aes(xintercept = Truth),
        color = "red",
        linewidth = 1
    ) +
    scale_fill_manual(
        name = "",
        values = c("Posterior" = "steelblue")
    ) +
    facet_wrap(vars(Parameter), ncol = 2, scales = "free") +
    scale_x_sqrt() +
    xlab("sqrt(Sample)") +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```

\pagebreak

## Summaries

```{r}
samples |>
    group_by(Parameter) |>
    summarise(
        n = n(),
        ESS = effectiveSize(Sample) |> round(),
        `Acceptance` = mean(Sample[-1] != Sample[1:length(Sample) - 1]) |> round(2),
        `Q 25%` = quantile(Sample, 0.025) |> round(2),
        Median = median(Sample) |> round(2),
        `Q 75%` = quantile(Sample, 0.975) |> round(2),
    ) |>
    left_join(truth, by = "Parameter") |>
    mutate(
        `Relative error` = abs((Median - Truth) / Truth) |> round(2)
    ) |>
    kbl(booktabs = TRUE)
```

## Sigmoids

```{r}
sigmoid <- function(x, sample) {
    theta <- sample |>
        pivot_wider(
            names_from = Parameter,
            values_from = Sample
        ) |>
        with(c(xscale, xshift, yscale, yshift))

    theta[3] / (1 + exp(-theta[1] * (x - theta[2]))) + theta[4]
}

p <- ggplot() +
    xlim(0, 10) +
    ylim(0, 3)

sampled_sigmoids <- samples |>
    filter(Iteration > 1950) |>
    group_by(Iteration) |>
    group_map(\(sample, ...) \(x) sigmoid(x, sample))

for (sig in sampled_sigmoids) {
    p <- p + stat_function(fun = sig, alpha = 0.2)
}

p +
    stat_function(
        aes(color = "Truth"),
        fun = \(x) sigmoid(x, truth |> rename(Sample = Truth)),
        linewidth = 1
    ) +
    scale_color_manual(
        name = "",
        values = c("Truth" = "red")
    ) +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
